rules.name: Service Organization Name
rules.description: Verify that the report identifies the service organization name (the company being audited).

rules.name: Audit Period Start Date
rules.description: Verify that the audit period start date in the report matches the expected date.

rules.name: Audit Period End Date
rules.description: Verify that the audit period end date in the report matches the expected date.

rules.name: Report Type Classification
rules.description: Verify that the report type (SOC 1 or SOC 2, Type I or Type II) matches the expected classification.
rules.input_label: Expected Report Type (e.g., SOC 2 Type II)

rules.name: Report Specificity
rules.description: Verify that the report specificity (generic or user-entity specific) matches expectations.
